column2: Through outside intervention or the act of rebels, our government has been separated from the rest of Germany. We must immediately rejoin Germany.
Integrate the Grand Duchy of Finland

Founded in 1809, the Grand Duchy of Finland was an autonomous region created after the annexation of the region in the Finnish War. Over the past few decades, the region has been a thorn in side, serving as an example of reform and cultural independence. We must revoke Finland's autonomy and begin Russification.

As there are now two nations in the USA, this modifier is present to prevent an OP amount of generals.

The North has gone too far, these United States shall be united no longer! The Southern States shall form their own confederacy independent of the North. It is up to them to determine if this happens peacefully or by force.
